cards.title: Picture of the day / A lovely location for a spot of golf
cards.rawTitle: A lovely location for a spot of golf

item.title: Sport picture of the day: a lovely location for a spot of golf
item.trailText: Mark Twain might have opined that “golf is a good walk spoiled” but there is no argument that the view at the 11th hole of the Macdonald Spey Valley Championship Golf Course in Aviemore is a corker
item.standFirst: Mark Twain might have opined that “golf is a good walk spoiled” but there is no argument that the view at the 11th hole of the Macdonald Spey Valley Championship Golf Course in Aviemore is a corker

displayImages.altText: Competitors putting on the picturesque 11th green during the second round of the 2015 SSE Scottish Hydro Challenge at the Macdonald Spey Valley Championship Golf Course in Aviemore, Scotland.

headerImage.caption: Competitors putting on the picturesque 11th green during the second round of the 2015 SSE Scottish Hydro Challenge at the Macdonald Spey Valley Championship Golf Course in Aviemore, Scotland. Photograph: Mark Runnacles/Getty Images
